text:
Cosmopolitan Hotel Hong Kong Presents Fantastic 4Family Published on : Sunday, October 25, 2015
Cosmopolitan Hotel Hong Kong, an award-winning family hotel, is pleased to introduce Beyond Thoughtful — Fantastic 4Family. Available till 31 Dec, 2016 , this educational, wondrous and fun-filled Fantastic 4Family includes a20% OFF Best Available Rate. Nightly rate starts from HK$950.
Top the list of the various fantastic experiences is the wide choice of newly renovated family rooms for family of different sizes and needs, including the much sought-after Deluxe Family Quad Room to house a family of 4 in a cosy place. Other experiences include,
Fantastic Family Room for 4 persons
A wide range of newly renovated family rooms including the signature and cosy DeluxeFamily Quad Room in Hong Kong
Fantastic Kids Amenities
Mustela’s baby care product for baby up to 3 years old and Johnson & Johnson brand for older kids Personalized dental kit, child-sized bathrobe and slippers Welcome snack box and teddy bear In-room sweet treats surprise Mobile storybook library featuring various kinds of books
Fantastic Baby-sitting Service
Complimentary 2-hour baby-sitting service (subject to availability)
Fantastic Breakfast
Complimentary daily breakfast for the whole family
Upgraded Shuttle Bus Service and Free Use of Smart Phone
Keeping in mind the convenience and comfort of every guest, Cosmopolitan Hong Kong Hotel has recently ungraded its shuttle bus service to include the city’s latest iconic event space — Central Harbourfront, which locates right next to Hong Kong Observation Wheel for a stunning view of the Victoria Harbour. With this addition, the hotel’s shuttle bus fleet brings the total number of locations to 16, covering popular tourist hotspots like Times Square shopping mall and Airport Express Line Hong Kong Station.
Each guest room also provides a complimentary use of smart phone with 3G internet which one can use to share internet connection with own mobile phones and tablets, make free local and long distance calls (IDD calls) to Australia, Canada, China, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Singapore, UK and US. This device can be used both inside and outside of the hotel.
